channel.title: Tts on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Tts on Arrans github.io

item.title: DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook
item.description: Generate audiobooks from e-books, voice cloning & 1158+ languages!

item.title: mudler/LocalAI
item.description: 🤖 The free, Open Source alternative to OpenAI, Claude and others. Self-hosted and local-first. Drop-in replacement for OpenAI, running on consumer-grade hardware. No GPU required. Runs gguf, transformers, diffusers and many more. Features: Generate Text, MCP, Audio, Video, Images, Voice Cloning, Distributed, P2P and decentralized inference

item.title: NVIDIA-NeMo/NeMo
item.description: A scalable generative AI framework built for researchers and developers working on Large Language Models, Multimodal, and Speech AI (Automatic Speech Recognition and Text-to-Speech)

item.description: A generative speech model for daily dialogue.

item.title: rhasspy/piper
item.description: A fast, local neural text to speech system

item.title: mbailey/voicemode
item.description: VoiceMode MCP brings natural conversations to Claude Code

item.title: yl4579/StyleTTS2
item.description: StyleTTS 2: Towards Human-Level Text-to-Speech through Style Diffusion and Adversarial Training with Large Speech Language Models
